title: n00dProjectiles
description: Lock, Load, and Launch with n00dProjectiles! Gear up your gameplay with versatile and precise projectile mechanics. From bullets that buzz to arrows that awe!
longDescription:
n00dProjectiles: The Ultimate Projectile System for Unreal Engine


Demonstration 📹

Getting Started 📹

Create Shooter 📹

Create Turret📹

Create Projectile 📹


Transform your game's combat dynamics with n00dProjectiles, a powerful and fully network replicated projectile system tailored for Unreal Engine. Perfect for action-packed games requiring precise shooting mechanics, n00dProjectiles offers a versatile platform for managing projectiles from arrows to bullets across diverse gameplay scenarios.


Key Features:


- Dynamic Replication Options: Features full network replication with two methods—spawned on auth only for consistent server control, or client prediction with authorized damage for responsive gameplay.

- Base Shooter Actor: a predefined base shooter actor that implements the projectiles component. This is ideal for static actors like wall shooters, gun barrels, or cannons, enhancing environmental interactions.

- Advanced Turret Actor: Inherits from the shooter actor, capable of aiming at players automatically, enhancing enemy AI and combat challenges.

- Embedded Actor Support: Supports an embedded actor that’s spawned at the hit location, mimicking residue or projectiles stuck in surfaces, perfect for enhancing visual impact and realism in games.

- Modular Traits System: Employs a modular traits system for both the shooter (e.g., barrel length, player skill) and the projectile (e.g., propellant type, shell weight), which intricately influences projectile mechanics calculated with each shot.

- Comprehensive Damage Types: Allows for customization of damage types, accommodating diverse combat scenarios and effects.

- Multiple Fire Modes: Supports single shot, automatic, and burst modes, offering flexibility for different weapons and combat styles.

- Index-Based Team Support: Ensures team-based gameplay is respected, preventing friendly fire from shooters and turrets.

- Extensive Example Assets: Includes example projectile actors and overlaps to demonstrate control of shooters from external sources, easing integration and experimentation.

- Demonstration Map: Features a demonstration map that showcases the capabilities and potential applications of n00dProjectiles in real game scenarios.


Powerful and Flexible

n00dProjectiles is built to accommodate any game type, providing robust control and versatility in projectile management. Whether implementing high-tech weaponry or medieval archery, this system adapts to your game’s needs seamlessly.


Part of the n00dWorkshop Suite

As a member of the upcoming n00dWorkshop suite, n00dProjectiles is designed for compatibility and enhanced interaction with other n00d assets, ensuring a cohesive development experience across your projects.


Ready for Immediate Deployment

With n00dProjectiles, elevate your game’s combat mechanics to new heights. This system is not just a tool—it's a game-changer, ready to integrate into your project with minimal setup for immediate impact.


Boost your game’s impact and realism with n00dProjectiles—the essential choice for developers dedicated to crafting engaging and dynamic combat experiences.

technicalDetails:
YOU DO NOT NEED TO KNOW C++ TO USE THIS PLUGIN! ALL N00D PLUGINS ARE BLUEPRINT-FIRST, C++ WHERE REQUIRED!



Code Modules:

  • Runtime

 

Number of Blueprints: 7 (excluding examples)

Number of C++ Classes: 1 (Project Settings)

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux
